basics.name: Steven Brien
basics.label: Developer
basics.summary: I'm a developer interested in creating intelligent and innovative applications for the internet. I learn complex subject matter very quickly, like to solve problems that require a wide range of skills and expertise, and enjoy designing and building systems from the ground up.

work.summary: At Response Marketing, I led the development of a custom platform for creating and maintaining complex marketing websites. Using the platform, I developed applications for numerous clients including Guess Watches, Intel Security / McAfee, Avi Networking, and REAN Cloud
highlights: Built a JSON API-driven platform for creating, deploying, and maintaining highly customizable marketing websites quickly and easily
Developed solutions for automating data collection and analysis for social media campaigns using Python (Pandas, NLTK, Matplotlib)

work.summary: For Partisan Records, I developed interactive applications and websites to advertise record releases.
highlights: Built a custom javascript application that allowed users to remix audio, video, and animated graphics from Sylvan Esso's album 'HSKT'. Users could record and share their creations on social media.

Developed a javascript application that would gather instagram videos with a specific hashtag, manipulate them, and combine them with cover artwork for Heartless Bastards's release 'Restless Ones' in a digital collage/double exposure effect.

work.summary: At Atomicdust I developed websites, single page web applications, and worked on server-side architecture to feed iOS apps. I also built and maintained a deployment framework for Atomicdust Wordpress sites.
highlights: Built and maintained DevOps framework for Atomicdust wordpress sites.

work.summary: All Along Press was a letterpress and screen-printing shop founded by Elysia Mann and I in St. Louis, MO. I designed and printed work for marketing agencies, design-conscious companies and individuals. I handled the shop's online presence: building and maintaining the website, e-commerce system, web-based project management system, server management etc.
highlights: Worked with dozens of marketing and design agencies to produce printed materials for national brands such as Woodford Reserve, Adobe, and Gatorade.
Managed all online design and marketing for the shop.
